mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM() row, IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, ATCH_FILE_ID, USERNAME, FORMATDATETIME ( REGDATE , 'yyyy-MM-dd') as REGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) WHERE row BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, ATCH_FILE_ID, USERNAME, FORMATDATETIME ( REGDATE , 'yyyy-MM-dd') as REGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{idx} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, ATCH_FILE_ID, USE_YN, REGDATE, USERNAME) VALUES (#{idx}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{atch_file_id}, 'Y', #{regdate}, #{username})
